original_text: His spear shaft was like a weaver’s rod, and its iron point weighed six hundred shekels. His shield bearer went ahead of him.
korean_text: 그 창 자루는 베틀 채 같고 창 날은 철 육백 세겔이며 방패 든 자가 앞서 행하더라

sentences.original_text: His spear shaft was like a weaver's rod
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 창 자루는 직공의 막대기와 같았으며

sentences.original_text: and its iron point weighed six hundred shekels
sentences.korean_translation: 그 창의 쇠 끝은 육백 세겔의 무게였습니다

sentences.original_text: His shield bearer went ahead of him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 방패 드는 자가 그의 앞에서 걸어갔습니다
